    • ccdVec3PointSegmentDist2

      public static double ccdVec3PointSegmentDist2(CCDVec3.ccd_vec3_t P, CCDVec3.ccd_vec3_t x0, CCDVec3.ccd_vec3_t b, CCDVec3.ccd_vec3_t witness)
      Returns distance2 of point P to segment ab. If witness is non-NULL it is filled with coordinates of point from which was computed distance to point P.
      Parameters:
      P - P
      x0 - x0
      b - b
      witness - witness
      Returns:
      distance distance

    • ccdVec3PointTriDist2

      public static double ccdVec3PointTriDist2(CCDVec3.ccd_vec3_t P, CCDVec3.ccd_vec3_t x0, CCDVec3.ccd_vec3_t B, CCDVec3.ccd_vec3_t C, CCDVec3.ccd_vec3_t witness)
      Returns distance2 of point P from triangle formed by triplet a, b, c. If witness vector is provided it is filled with coordinates of point from which was computed distance to point P.
      Parameters:
      P - PO
      x0 - x0
      B - B
      C - C
      witness - witness
      Returns:
      distance
